section.title: Overview
section.p: The Apache HCatalog source code resides in the Apache Subversion (SVN) repository. The command-line SVN client can be obtained here. The TortoiseSVN GUI client for Windows can be obtained here. There are also SVN plugins available for both Eclipse and IntelliJ IDEA.

section.title: Web Access (read-only)
section.p: The source code can be browsed via the Web at http://svn.apache.org/viewcvs.cgi/incubator/hcatalog. No SVN client software is required.

section.title: Anonymous Access (read-only)
section.p: The SVN URL for anonymous users is http://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/hcatalog/. Instructions for anonymous SVN access are here.

section.title: Committer Access (read-write)
section.p: The SVN URL for committers is https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/hcatalog/. Instructions for committer SVN access are here.

section.title: git
section.p: Apache maintains a read only git repository. git://git.apache.org/hcatalog.git. For more information on Apache's use of git see Apache's git page.
